import json
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, LongType, IntegerType, FloatType, BooleanType
# from schema_build import spark_avro_deserializer

keyVaultName = "cdc-streaming-kv2"
secretName = "eh-connstring"
connectionString = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret(keyVaultName, secretName)
EH_name = "wwi-03"
connectionStringEntity = connectionString + ";EntityPath=" + EH_name
consumer_group = "$Default"

checkpoint_loc = "abfss://dlcdcstreaming@dlcdcstreaming.dfs.core.windows.net/landing/orders/checkpoint/"
output_loc = "abfss://dlcdcstreaming@dlcdcstreaming.dfs.core.windows.net/landing/orders/output/"

# Create the starting position Dictionary
startingEventPosition = {
  "offset": "-1",         
  "seqNo": 0,                   # not in use
  "enqueuedTime": None,         # not in use
  "isInclusive": True,
  "fromStartOfStream": True     # start from beginning of Stream
}

ehConf = {
  "eventhubs.startingPosition" : json.dumps(startingEventPosition),
  "setMaxEventsPerTrigger" : 100,
  "eventhubs.consumerGroup" : consumer_group
}

ehConf["eventhubs.connectionString"] = sc._jvm.org.apache.spark.eventhubs.EventHubsUtils.encrypt(connectionStringEntity)

# Check if is streaming
print(df_raw.isStreaming)
print("-----")
df_raw.printSchema()

# Check if is streaming
print(df_parsed.isStreaming)
print("-----")
df_parsed.printSchema()

OBJ_SCHEMA_MAP = {
    'orders': (
        StructType()    \
        .add("OrderID", IntegerType()) \
        .add("CustomerID", IntegerType())  \
        .add("SalespersonPersonID", IntegerType()) \
        .add("PickedByPersonID", IntegerType())    \
        .add("ContactPersonID", IntegerType()) \
        .add("BackorderOrderID", IntegerType())    \
        .add("OrderDate", IntegerType())   \
        .add("ExpectedDeliveryDate", IntegerType())    \
        .add("CustomerPurchaseOrderNumber", StringType())  \
        .add("IsUndersupplyBackordered", BooleanType())    \
        .add("Comments", StringType()) \
        .add("DeliveryInstructions", StringType())   \
        .add("InternalComments", StringType()) \
        .add("PickingCompletedWhen", LongType())   \
        .add("LastEditedBy", IntegerType())    \
        .add("LastEditedWhen", LongType())),
}

def get_cdc_schema(obj_name: str):
    # if obj_name not in OBJ_SCHEMA_MAP.keys():
    #     raise KeyError
    obj_schema = OBJ_SCHEMA_MAP[obj_name]
    return (
        StructType()
        .add("op", StringType())
        .add("ts_ms", LongType())
        .add("before", obj_schema)
        .add("after", obj_schema)
    )

# Streaming Query in scheduler pool
spark.sparkContext.setLocalProperty("spark.scheduler.pool", "pool0")

CDC_query_old = df_raw \
    .withColumn("year", year("enqueuedTime"))   \
    .withColumn("month", month("enqueuedTime"))   \
    .withColumn("day", dayofmonth("enqueuedTime"))   \
    .withColumn("hour", hour("enqueuedTime"))   \
    .writeStream    \
    .queryName("CDC_query_old") \
    .format("parquet")  \
    .partitionBy("year", "month", "day", "hour")    \
    .outputMode("append")   \
    .option("checkpointLocation", checkpoint_loc)   \
    .option("path", output_loc)    \
    .start()

# Check the status of query

print(CDC_query_old.isActive)
print("-----")
print(CDC_query_old.exception())

# Streaming Query in scheduler pool
spark.sparkContext.setLocalProperty("spark.scheduler.pool", "pool0")

CDC_query = df_deserialized \
    .withColumn("year", year("ts"))   \
    .withColumn("month", month("ts"))   \
    .withColumn("day", dayofmonth("ts"))   \
    .withColumn("hour", hour("ts"))   \
    .writeStream    \
    .queryName("CDC_query") \
    .format("parquet")  \
    .partitionBy("year", "month", "day", "hour")    \
    .outputMode("append")   \
    .option("checkpointLocation", checkpoint_loc)   \
    .option("path", output_loc)    \
    .start()

# Check the status of query

print(CDC_query.isActive)
print("-----")
print(CDC_query.exception())
